column4: Hey, I don't want to tell the #ubuntu people how to run their channel, but we use +r in #python and don't have this problem.
-- a lot of users aren't really big ICQ users, so they may not have their nicks registered
who cares, it takes three seconds and I think you can change the message so it tells people exactly what to do.
I think it would be a good idea, honestly....just saying that's probably the reason they haven't done it
